appDesc.message: Adds Widescreen + Fullscreen modes to ChatGPT for enhanced viewing + reduced scrolling

menuLabel_fullerWins.message: Tala a faamalama ke fakauke a te vau ki loto o te ea foou mai tua.

mode_wideScreen.message: A te sikulini fakamaonia ka tuu mai.

tooltip_wideScreenON.message: A te sikulini fakamaonia ka tuu mai.

tooltip_newChat.message: A fakamaumauga o galuega togi ki aofaki o galuega fai

alert_pressF11.message: Press F11 to exit full screen

alert_f11reason.message: F11 was used to enter full screen, and due to browser security reasons, the same key must be used to exit it
